subject: CNN Alerts: bush
body:
CNN Alerts: bush






 



Alert Name: bush
Bush heads from G8 to meet pope after stop in Poland

06/08/07 11:29 PM, EDT
President Bush will travel to the Vatican Saturday for an audience with Pope Benedict XVI and bilateral meetings with Italian leaders, as his weeklong European tour moves south to the Mediterranean. 
FULL STORY
